body_html: Closing this issue due to lack of activity. @nolanliou Hopefully things are working now, but feel free to reopen if you can reproduce with a simpler example. @OscarDPan We upgraded to a version of gRPC that fixes a big deadlock bug (that happened more frequently at higher load) in the latest nightly build (will be in TF 1.5), so you might want to try upgrading to see if that fixes the connectivity problems. If it doesn't, please open a new issue with the relevant details.

body: Closing this issue due to lack of activity. @nolanliou Hopefully things are working now, but feel free to reopen if you can reproduce with a simpler example. @OscarDPan We upgraded to a version of gRPC that fixes a big deadlock bug (that happened more frequently at higher load) in the latest nightly build (will be in TF 1.5), so you might want to try upgrading to see if that fixes the connectivity problems. If it doesn't, please open a new issue with the relevant details.
